casebody.data:
28 A.3d 643 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND, Petitioner v. Stanley Howard NEEDLEMAN, Respondent. Misc. Docket AG No. 24,

Sept. Term, 2011.

Court of Appeals of Maryland. Sept. 12, 2011.

ORDER

This matter came before the Court on the Joint Petition of the Attorney Grievance Commission of Maryland and Respondent, Stanley Howard Needleman, to disbar the Respondent, by consent, from the practice of law.

The Court, having considered the Petition, it is this 12th day of September, 2011.

ORDERED, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland, that the Respondent, Stanley Howard Needleman, be and he is hereby disbarred by consent from the practice of law in the State of Maryland, and it is further,

ORDERED, that the Clerk of this Court shall remove the name of Stanley Howard Needleman from register of attorneys in the Court and certify that fact to the Client Protection Fund and all Clerks of all judicial tribunals in this State in accordance with Maryland Rule 16-773(d).
